name: Red Yet Capers: Math vs Mayhem
name_original: Red Yet Capers: Math vs Mayhem
description:
Red Yet Capers is a mix of mathematic question solving, running, and jumping, shooting, and ducking Mathemies (math enemies). Additional features are two mini Arcade Game rooms with added fun, when you collect a certain number of Red Yet cogs. For ages 8 and up.
Gameplay: 100% Keyboard controlled game - gameplay controls shown during gameplay.

Purchase Includes:
1 - .exe game file
2 - free download of DLC that will be available April 30, 2022

A RED YET Game / Inspired by Billy Minter & Dré Damion / Designed by Tazzz Web Designs
Please note: for every sale, 20% goes towards a child in need.
